entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
